title: User Registration with Email and Verification
description: Verify that a new user can register with a valid email and password, receives an email verification, and completes profile setup.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email and strong password
Submit registration form
Confirm registration success message is shown
Verify verification email is sent to the registered email
Click email verification link
Validate email verification success and redirection to profile setup
Complete profile setup with mandatory fields
Confirm profile setup completion and access to the dashboard

title: Login with Email and Session Management
description: Check that a registered user can log in with correct credentials, maintains session across pages, and logs out successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input registered email and correct password
Click login button
Confirm successful login and redirection to dashboard
Navigate to different app pages
Verify user session is maintained without re-login prompt
Click logout button
Confirm user is logged out and redirected to login page

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails when user inputs incorrect email or password and shows an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email with incorrect password
Click login button
Display error message for invalid credentials and prevent login
Enter unregistered email and any password
Click login button
Show error message indicating user not found

title: Subscription Flow: Free Trial Activation and Upgrade
description: Verify user can start a free trial, access trial features, and upgrade to paid subscription via Stripe checkout successfully.

steps.description: Log in as a new user without subscription
Activate free trial from subscription page
Free trial is activated and user has access to trial features
Navigate to subscription plans
Select a paid plan and proceed to Stripe checkout
Complete payment with valid test card details
Subscription is updated to paid status and full feature access granted

title: Subscription Cancellation and Renewal Handling
description: Check that users can cancel subscriptions, receive confirmation, and renew subscriptions without issues.

steps.description: Log in as a subscribed user
Navigate to subscription management
Request subscription cancellation
Confirm cancellation success message and updated subscription status
Attempt to renew subscription by selecting plan and paying via Stripe
Subscription is active again and full features are restored

title: PDF Reader: Open, Select Text, and Annotate
description: Verify users can open PDF materials, select text accurately, and create annotations or highlights.

steps.description: Navigate to study room and select a PDF material
PDF is rendered with correct content
Select a block of text in the PDF
Selected text is highlighted as expected
Add an annotation or note to the selected text
Annotation is saved and visible on PDF
Reload PDF and verify annotations persist

title: AI Flashcard Generation from PDF Text Selection
description: Validate that selecting text in PDF triggers AI-powered flashcard generation successfully with relevant content.

steps.description: Open a PDF material in study room
Select a meaningful paragraph or sentence
Trigger flashcard generation via AI assistant
Flashcard is generated with correct question and answer based on selected text
Flashcard is saved in user's flashcards list

title: Flashcards: Study with Spaced Repetition and Performance Tracking
description: Check the flashcard system supports spaced repetition scheduling and accurately tracks user performance metrics.

steps.description: Navigate to flashcards study module
Study flashcards with multiple repetitions
Spaced repetition algorithm schedules flashcards appropriately
Mark flashcards as known or difficult
Performance analytics update and display accuracy rates and progress

title: Quiz System: Take Quiz with Timer, Multiple Choices, and Feedback
description: Ensure that quizzes show timed multiple-choice questions, provide immediate feedback, and record results for analytics.

steps.description: Open quiz module and select a quiz category
Start the quiz and begin timer
Answer multiple-choice questions within given time limits
After each question, receive immediate feedback if answer is correct or wrong
At quiz end, display summary with score and analytics

title: Traffic Signs Library: Search, Categorize, and Progress Tracking
description: Verify users can search traffic signs, view categorized lists, take related quizzes, and track progress accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to traffic signs library
Search for specific traffic sign by name or code
Search results correctly display matching signs
Browse traffic signs by predefined categories
Category view shows correct signs
Take quiz related to traffic signs category
User quiz progress and performance are tracked and displayed

title: Push and Email Notifications Delivery and Preferences
description: Check notification system sends push and email alerts for study reminders, updates, and subscription alerts, respecting user preferences.

steps.description: Set notification preferences for push and email in user settings
Trigger a study reminder notification event
Push or email notification is sent only if enabled in preferences
Trigger subscription alert notification
Notification is received correctly and contains accurate information
Simulate notification failure and check fallback handling
Fallback notification method sends alert successfully

title: Admin Dashboard: User and Subscription Management
description: Verify admin users can view, update, and deactivate user accounts and manage subscription statuses through the admin panel.

steps.description: Log in as admin user
Navigate to user management panel
Search and view a user profile
Update user roles or deactivate account
Changes are saved and reflected in user status
Navigate to subscription management
Update or revoke user subscription
Subscription status updates correctly and user access is adjusted

title: Audit Logs: Record and View User Activities
description: Ensure that all critical actions by users and admins are logged with timestamp and details, and the audit logs are accessible in admin panel.

steps.description: Perform various user actions like login, subscription update, content creation
Log in as admin and open audit logs panel
Audit logs display recorded events with accurate timestamps and event details
Filter audit logs by user, date, or action type
Filters apply correctly and show relevant logs

title: AI Study Chat Assistant: Real-time Interaction and Content Generation
description: Test the AI chat assistant provides relevant study help, explanations, and generates content such as summaries and mind maps in real-time.

steps.description: Open study room and start AI chat assistant
Ask a study-related question or request content generation
Receive coherent and accurate response from AI within reasonable time
Request AI to generate summary or mind map of specified topic
AI generates requested content correctly and displays it appropriately

title: Multi-device UI Responsiveness and Performance
description: Validate that the platform UI renders correctly and functions properly on different device screen sizes with loading times under 3 seconds.

steps.description: Open the application in desktop browser with large screen resolution
UI components render correctly, navigation works, and no layout issues exist
Open the application in tablet and mobile viewport sizes
UI adapts responsively with readable text and accessible controls
Measure page load times in each device viewport
Loading times are consistently under 3 seconds

title: Security: Data Encryption and LGPD Compliance
description: Verify that sensitive user data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and that the platform respects Brazilian LGPD data privacy guidelines.

steps.description: Register a new user with personal identifiable information
Inspect network traffic to confirm data is encrypted via HTTPS/TLS
Access stored data in database via admin tools
Confirm sensitive fields are encrypted or hashed where applicable
Request user data deletion or export as per LGPD rights
User data is deleted or exported fully within legal timeframe
